text: (Hajarata ibrahima alai.) Mhanale ki tumhi allaha'aivaji jya murti (daivatam) ci puja arcana keli ahe tyanna tumhi apalya aihika maitrice karana banavile ahe. Tumhi sarva kayamatacya divasi ekamekanca inkara karu lagala ani ekamekanna dhihkkaru lagala ani tumha sarrance thikana jahannamadhye asela, ani koni tumaci madata karanarahi nasela
